item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

RICHTER'S
Manager Contact: Jennifer H.

Specials:

$2 bottled beers - PBR and Miller High Life
$4 drafts - Molson Canadian
$5 1/2 yards - select any of our beers on tap
$4 any well drink

Appetizers, buy 3, get the fourth one free.

Your contact is: Robyn-Allise - 203-823-5302
Please RSVP right now!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***

Post-party location TBD.

side note:
Hi All!

For those of you who have been around for awhile and those of you who are new to The New Haven Collective...we hope you are enjoying all the events the NHC has to offer.

Many of you are probably not aware, but due to the fact that we have a URL on Meet Up, the NHC (ROBEN specifically) gets charged $72 every 6 months. Although some of the latest and greatest changes that Meet Up has made, has been, well...shall we say, not so helpful, we still must pay the fees.

Last March we passed around a coffee can at an HH and collected a $1 or $2 per person to help towards the funding of the URL. We graciously accepted the $44 we received.

ROBEN feels it's time to pass around the coffee can for your contributions. It will be at the HH on 1/28 at Richter's as well as the next few events in which ROBEN is attending.

Thank you in advance for your generosity. We all appreciate it.


The Management
ROBEN
item.name: 1/28 Happy Hour - RICHTER'S
